name: Missile Control (sjjahaus)
description:
Controls:

up, down, left, right arrows move the player towards it's forward axis. 

Missile Control, is a spin off of missile command where the player must guide the heat seeking missiles shot from the planet towards the incoming non heat seeking missiles. The goal is to survive as long as you can against the onslaught of missiles  to gain the most score you can. 

The whole idea of this game is instead of shooting the weapon itself, you must use your control and skill over the ship to move the rockets towards the target. This takes away the whole requirement of shooting in the shooter genre and experience the ability to have a higher level control over what you shoot and when.

The game gives you 5 seconds to get ready. Each circle surrounding the rockets will represent different amounts of control you have over that missile. If you want quick responsive  movements, go closer to the missile. If you go out of the circles of the rocket, the rocket will no longer follow you.
